title: 6 perch land at Borella for sale
details:
The perfect location to build your dream home with a beautiful views around you. Marvelous surrounding with a silent, calm and peaceful neighborhood.

This land consist of 6 perches with a bare land ready to construct. Suitable location for you to enjoy natures essence also being an ideal investment for a brighter future.

Easy access to both Baseline road and cambell place. Schools, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants and all your needs within close range.

Call Linea Property for more inquiries.
